useGroupedAccessorPairs.description:
Description

Enforce that getters and setters for the same property are adjacent in class and object definitions.
When defining a property in a class or object, itâ€™s common to have both a getter and a setter.
This rule enforces that getter is defined right before the setter,
making the code more maintainable and easier to read.
useGroupedAccessorPairs.option: This rule has no specific options.
